bio: Blizzaria dresses up as the witch and flies around on a broom! She freezes anyone who doesn’t have her favourite sweets.

soultimate.name: Shiny Snowdrifts
soultimate.description: A pillar of ice appears to hit foes for lots of damage.

skill.effect: Increases damage of Ice Element attacks by 25%.
skill.name: Snow Play

name: Witch Girl Blizzaria
